name: coworking-site
description: _This project is an exercise in developing a website based on a theoretical client request.  The full-cycle workflow will go as follows:_ * _Identify target users & their stories_ * _Research design ideas & layouts based on the target users and client requests_ * _Hand-draw pages to decide on page layouts_ * _Turn drawn layouts into a hi-fi site mockup_ * _Turn said mockup into a functioning prototype_ * _Create webpage that accurately reflects the prototype_
